Index entries for sequences related to Bernoulli numbers.
formula: These Bernoulli polynomials B(s) = B(s)(x) are defined by: B(0) = 1; B(s) = (-x/s)*Sum_{t=1..s} (-1)^t*binomial(s, t)*Bernoulli(t)*B(s-t), where Bernoulli(t) are the usual Bernoulli numbers A027641/A027642. Also B(s)(1) = Bernoulli(s).
maple: B:=bernoulli; b:=proc(s) option remember; local t; global r; if s=0 then RETURN(1); fi; expand((-r/s)*add( (-1)^t*binomial(s,t)*B(t)*b(s-t),t=1..s)); end; [seq(denom(b(n)),n=0..30)];
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
